snippet: A sixth man has pleaded guilty in racially motivated attacks by young whites against blacks in Jackson.
abstract: Joseph Paul Dominick of Brandon, Miss, pleads guilty to conspiracy to commit a hate crime; he is sixth man to plead guilty in racially motivated attacks by young whites against blacks in Jackson.
lead_paragraph: A sixth man has pleaded guilty in racially motivated attacks by young whites against blacks in Jackson.

headline.main: Mississippi: Another Guilty Plea in Racial Attacks
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Another Guilty Plea In Racial Attacks
